remarks: Zero times a vector is the zero vector.  Equation 1a of [Kreyszig] p. 51.  ( ~ lmod0vs analog.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clm0vs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
clm0vs.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
clm0vs.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
clm0vs.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
clm0vs $p |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( 0 .x. X ) = .0. ) $.
